DocAttribute.Name: LiningDepth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Depth of the door lining, measured perpendicular to the plane of the door lining. If omitted (and with a given value to lining thickness) it indicates an adjustable depth (i.e. a depth that adjusts to the thickness of the wall into which the occurrence of this door style is inserted).

DocAttribute.Name: LiningThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Thickness (width in plane parallel to door leaf) of the door lining.

DocAttribute.Name: ThresholdDepth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Depth (dimension in plane perpendicular to door leaf) of the door threshold. Only given if the door lining includes a threshold. If omitted (and with a given value to threshold thickness) it indicates an adjustable depth (i.e. a depth that adjusts to the thickness of the wall into which the occurrence of this door style is inserted).

DocAttribute.Name: ThresholdThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Thickness (width in plane parallel to door leaf) of the door threshold. Only given if the door lining includes a threshold and the parameter is known.

DocAttribute.Name: TransomThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Thickness (width in plane parallel to door leaf) of the transom (if given) which divides the door leaf from a glazing (or window) above.

DocAttribute.Name: TransomOffset
DocAttribute.Documentation: Offset of the transom (if given) which divides the door leaf from a glazing (or window) above. The offset is given from the bottom of the door opening.

DocAttribute.Name: LiningOffset
DocAttribute.Documentation: Offset (dimension in plane perpendicular to door leaf) of the door lining. The offset is given as distance to the x axis of the local placement.

DocAttribute.Name: ThresholdOffset
DocAttribute.Documentation: Offset (dimension in plane perpendicular to door leaf) of the door threshold. The offset is given as distance to the x axis of the local placement. Only given if the door lining includes a threshold and the parameter is known.

DocAttribute.Name: CasingThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Thickness of the casing (dimension in plane of the door leaf). If given it is applied equally to all four sides of the adjacent wall.

DocAttribute.Name: CasingDepth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Depth of the casing (dimension in plane perpendicular to door leaf). If given it is applied equally to all four sides of the adjacent wall.

DocAttribute.Name: ShapeAspectStyle
DocAttribute.Documentation: Pointer to the shape aspect, if given. The shape aspect reflects the part of the door shape, which represents the door lining.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either both parameter, _LiningDepth_ and _LiningThickness_ are given, or only the _LiningThickness_, then the _LiningDepth_ is variable. It is not valid to only assert the _LiningDepth_. > NOTE  A LiningDepth with NIL ($) value indicates a door style with a lining equal to the wall thickness.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR32
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either both parameter, _ThresholdDepth_ and _ThresholdThickness_ are given, or only the _ThresholdThickness_, then the _ThresholdDepth_ is variable. It is not valid to only assert the _ThresholdDepth_. > NOTE  A ThresholdDepth with NIL ($) value indicates a door style with a lining equal to the wall thickness.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR33
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either both parameter, _TransomDepth_ and _TransomThickness_ are given, or none of them.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR34
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either both parameter, the _CasingDepth_ and the _CasingThickness_, are given, or none of them.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR35
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _IfcDoorLiningProperties_ shall only be used in the context of an _IfcDoorStyle_.
